page.description: UI_GET_PASSWORD() creates and displays a dialog box to prompt for a password. The Result String will be empty ("") if the Cancel button is selected.
page.syntax: Result_String as C = ui_get_password(C title ,C prompt [,C default_choice [,C password_character ]])

argument.name: title
argument.description: The title of the dialog box.

argument.name: prompt
argument.description: The caption next to the data entry field.

argument.name: default_choice
argument.description: Optional. Default = "". The default value to display.

argument.name: password_character
argument.description: Optional. Default = the actual characters typed. The character to display as the user types.

section.title: Example
section.description: Prompts the user for a password and beeps if the password is incorrect.
section.example: password = "Alpha5" user = ui_get_password("Password","Enter the password","","&") if user = "" then end end if if user == password then ui_msg_box("Password","Accepted.") else ui_beep() ui_msg_box("Password", "Password invalid.") end end if
